reviews.customers_say: Customers find the dress to be of good quality, with one mentioning it's perfect for a forest-themed prom. The dress offers a perfect fit that works well with 4-inch heels, and customers appreciate its stretchiness, with one noting it makes the tummy look small. They like the material's thickness, comfort, and color, and find it true to size and good value for money. items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Stunning fit and style
items.body: Purchased for a gala. Absolutely stunning. Very slimming style. I was worried about the height of the slit but it was perfect. The sparkles are stunning. I am short and the length with my 2 inch heels was perfect. Read more
items.author: Amy

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very Pretty Dress
items.body: I loved this dress. It fit well, it was very comfortable and I received many compliments. Read more
items.author: Karleen A. Cipriano

items.title: 4.0 out of 5 stars Great dress, but will be returning due to straps
items.body: The dress is stunning! The material has give and is comfortable. Very forgiving at the belly. I’m 5’2 and 140lbs, bust size 36D and it fit perfectly and it was the perfect length with my 4 inch heels. The only down side for me is the straps. From a distance they look great, but up close it’s a bit tacky. I’m sadly returning this dress for another design of my formal event. Read more
items.author: Amanda

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars The overall look - quality
items.body: Loved the dress- and the size was a perfect fit. Read more
items.author: Diane

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Beautiful in blue
items.body: Beautiful, it fit so perfectly. I loved it. I felt so pretty. It is the best value for the price. The material is stretchy and fits over all your curves. Great for warmer weather. The material isn’t too thick. Read more
items.author: Lori Alford

items.title: 1.0 out of 5 stars I received a worn/used dress!
items.body: I received this dress and it smelled of perfume and has deodorant stains. It appears to been worn & returned. I will certainly return it , not only because it was used but it is also too big. I ordered a size down. Read more
items.author: Maria Birth

items.title: 5.0 out of 5 stars Gorgeous dress
items.body: This dress is such great quality elegant and so dressy. I loved it. True to size. Read more
items.author: Patty

items.title: 3.0 out of 5 stars Not as pictured
items.body: It is a beautiful dress however it’s not the same as the picture! The one I ordered was supposed to have the silver sleeves and the are red. Read more
items.author: felicia

short_description:
Womens Dress Split High Split Bodycon Sleeveless Formal is made for a polished look that still feels comfortable to wear. It is designed to sit cleanly on the body with a flattering shape that works for day plans and dressier moments without feeling overdone.

The fit focuses on balance rather than extremes, so you can move naturally while still getting a defined silhouette. Choose your usual size for a closer look, or size up if you prefer a little more ease through the waist and hips.

Styling is simple: keep accessories minimal for a clean finish, or add a jacket and statement shoes when you want a sharper outfit. This piece photographs well thanks to smooth lines and a structured feel that stays put once you have it adjusted.

With the right fit and simple styling, this item becomes an easy go-to when you want something that looks intentional without requiring extra effort.

Comfort comes from both the cut and the fabric, so selecting your preferred fit makes a noticeable difference over a full day of wear.

If you are between sizes, choose based on how close you like the fit through the waist and hips, then adjust with your usual layering choices.

long_description:
Womens Dress Split High Split Bodycon Sleeveless Formal is a versatile piece you can reach for when you want a put-together look that still feels comfortable. The goal is simple: a silhouette that reads polished, photographs well, and stays wearable for a full day or a long night.

Fit and sizing Fit is where most outfits win or lose. This design aims for a balanced shape with a defined line through the torso, a clean waist, and a smooth finish through the hips and legs. If you prefer a more relaxed feel, size up; if you like a closer fit, stay true to size. Sizes may include: 5, 5.5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 8.5, 9, 9.5, 10, 11.

Fabric and comfort Comfort is not just about softness. It is also about movement and how the fabric behaves as you walk, sit, and stand. A fabric blend with a bit of give helps it keep its shape while still feeling wearable.

Highlights A clean neckline and a refined silhouette for an elevated look. Designed to layer easily with jackets, wraps, or sweaters. Works well with both minimal accessories and statement pieces.

How to style Styling ideas: keep it minimal with neutral shoes and one standout accessory. For a relaxed daytime look, add a denim jacket or cardigan. For events, switch to a bolder shoe and a small clutch for a sharper finish.

Color notes Available colors may include: Orchid, Burgundy, Olive Green, Burnt Orange, Hot Pink, Black, Coffee, Navy Blue, Dusty Rose, Dark Green, Red, Teal, Deep Purple, Sapphire Blue. If a shade is sold out, check back as availability can change.

Care Care guidance matters if you want it to keep its shape and finish. Follow the label first.
